articles.title: Solar Horns at Sunrise: Our Guide to the June 10th Annular Solar Eclipse - Universe Today
articles.description: The only annular eclipse of 2021 will produce a fine annular eclipse across most of North America and Europe.
articles.content:
The only annular eclipse of 2021 will produce a fine spectacle across most of North America and Europe.
Got those solar glasses handy from 2017? If skies are clear on the morning of Thursday June 10… [+6832 chars]

articles.author: Ollie Neas
articles.title: How NZ’s new deal with Nasa could pave the way for moon mining - The Spinoff
articles.description:
The American-led Artemis Accords, signed this week by New Zealand, make a lot of the right noises. But they could lead to a more privatised, US-dominated future of space exploitation – and lunar mining. That’s a problem, writes Ollie Neas. 

After nearly 50…
